intro.title: Your next developer
intro.subtitle: Hello! I'm Daniel Bueno, I'm 16 years old and a frontend developer

paragraph.text1: My name is Daniel Bueno, and I have been passionate about technology since I was a child. I started developing and programming in 2022, fell completely in love with programming, and since then, I have been striving to constantly improve. So, I applied for the selection process to enter Etec Jaragu√° in the Systems Development course with High School, and fortunately, I was accepted in second place.
paragraph.text2: Currently, I am in the 2nd year of high school at Etec Jaragu√°. I work on projects with ReactJS, NodeJS, among other technologies, and I wish to explore new languages, technologies, and frameworks. Although I am currently in the frontend area, I want to become a full stack developer. I plan to apply for internship positions to gain professional experience, as I have never worked in this field.
paragraph.text3: I enjoy learning new things to apply in my projects, and I always dedicate part of my day to studying development on my own. Besides technology, I love weight training, riding my bike, camping, listening to music, reading books, going to church, and seeing dividends deposited into my account.

ds.text: See everything about the Systems Development course!
ds.about: Developed in partnership with two school friends, with the goal of promoting our course and increasing our visibility, this idea was suggested by a teacher, and we decided to take on the responsibility for the project. This was my first development project with ReactJS!

short.text: Know the content of the video without even opening it.
short.about: Short Summary allows users to view a summary of the video without needing to watch it, using artificial intelligence to extract the text and create the summary. This was my first experience with Express, which taught me a lot about NodeJS.

age.about: The Age Calculator is a web application that allows users to calculate their age in years, months, and days. This project allowed me to learn a lot about date manipulation in JavaScript, as well as improve my skills with forms in HTML and CSS.

festa.text: History, foods, and recipes, everything about Festa Junina!
festa.about: Festa Junina is a web application that allows users to learn more about the Festa Junina, its origins, foods, and recipes. This project was a school assignment and was developed only for desktop responsiveness. It helped me to better understand how JavaScript works and the importance of a minimalist design.

cps.text: Measure your CPS and see your score!
cps.about: The CPS Test is a web application that allows users to measure their clicks per second speed and view their score. This project was inspired by a challenge my friend proposed to me, and being competitive, I decided to develop it. It was an opportunity to learn about event handling in JavaScript.
